responsibilities: Analyze, develop, combine raw information, and maintain various data sources
Identify opportunities for data acquisition and collaborate with Application owners and Subject Matter Experts (SME) to document data domain knowledge
Implement ETL methods to prepare both structured and unstructured data for predictive and prescriptive modeling
Leverage data serialization techniques to meet project needs for use in various reporting platforms
Understand enterprise project life cycle and prepare for integration and user acceptance testing methods
Produce technical documentation by following enterprise standards and guidelines
Proactively identify issues and opportunities that will impact the business use of reports and ensure managerial awareness
skills: Ability to write SQL queries, develop and tune query performance
Develop skills for appropriate use of technology to align with project needs
Familiarize and scale tools such as: SQL Server, SSIS, Python, Azure, Docker, Git, and Visual Studio
Ability to understand and interact with cloud technology such as: Azure, AWS and/or GCP preferred
Support current and future initiatives of application development
Participate in peer-review of codes and maintain repositories
Concentra Core Competencies of Service Mentality, Attention to Detail, Sense of Urgency, Initiative and Flexibility
Ability to make decisions or solve problems by using logic to identify key facts
Good communication skills to effectively speak and write in a clear and professional manner
Skilled at listening, understanding, and providing feedback
Outstanding customer service skills and ability to deal with people in a manner which shows tact and professionalism
Ability to properly handle sensitive and confidential information (including HIPAA and PHI) in accordance with federal and state laws and company policies
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed focus primarily on data analysis, data management, and the use of various data processing and cloud technologies. The responsibilities include tasks such as analyzing and maintaining data sources, implementing ETL methods, and preparing data for predictive and prescriptive modeling. The skills required include proficiency in SQL, familiarity with tools like SQL Server, SSIS, Python, Azure, Docker, and Git, and understanding cloud technologies like Azure, AWS, and GCP.

There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is more on data management, data processing, and cloud technology rather than on developing or working with AI models, particularly generative or language models.
